content: X-C P8 Concrete nails Single nail for fastening to concrete using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fastener for attaching a variety of thin materials to masonry block and concrete Suitable for soft to medium-hard concrete (up to 45 N/mm² concrete strength) Best suited for fastening to concrete with a hardness of up to 6,000 psi Applications Fastening drywall track to concrete Attaching wire mesh and thin sheet metal to concrete, sand-lime block and solid brick Fastening brick ties to masonry or concrete Fastening HVAC duct strapping or suspended ceilings on normal-strength concrete Securing electrical junction boxes, conduits and cables to masonry block or concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick) Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 80 mm Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.14 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 3524061 -
